content: tote along all your daily essentials in this cute crochet bag stitched in sturdy bernat softee cotton you ll work in the round as you practice cluster stitch half_double_crochet increases and single_crochet techniques make it as designed for a bright spring look or imagine your carry-all in another fresh color to celebrate the season measuring 17 wide x 15 high it s a must-have bag for everyday use video tutorial for textured tote same pattern https //www youtube com/watch v=_rcwfaz-jc8 yarn for model bernat® softee cotton™ 4 2 oz/120 g 254 yds/232 m golden 69013 2 balls
